column1: }}'''Déorwine''' was the Chief of the [[King's Riders]] during the [[War of the Ring]].
An outstanding warrior, Déorwine and six of his knights were slain at the [[Battle of the Pelennor Fields]].<ref>{{RK
The name ''Déorwine'' probably means "brave-friend" in [[Old English]], consisting of ''[[Wiktionary:deor#Old_English
'''2012: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Riders of Rohan]]'':'''
:Déorwine can be encountered in Edoras, but currently plays no role in the storyline.
